title: Need help
content: I secured admission through the management quota for CSE, but with a 6.1k rank in PESSAT, I was eligible for CSE (AI&ML) at the Ecity campus. When I called the reception today to inquire about converting my management seat to a PESSAT seat, they mentioned I need to visit the campus to do so. I asked if thereâ€™s a realistic chance of making the switch before I travel from Delhi to Bengaluru, and they said it is possible. Should I go to the main campus, or would it be a waste of my fatherâ€™s money on flight tickets?

My friend had applied for the management seat in ec campus, aiml. He didn't attend second round counselling where his rank was 500 ranks better than mine. He could've got the same seat thru pessat.

Moral, don't close your options and try everything to save that money. Its a few years of your parents life you're talking about
